video.title: Yûgiô
video.synopsis: Inspired by the popular Japanese manga of the same name, this animated series follows young Yugi Moto and his best friends Joey, Tristan and Tea, whose lives are forever changed when they realize their favorite fantasy card game is real.

episodes.synopsis: High schooler Yugi Motu and his friends become embroiled in a deadly match of Duel Monsters when champion Seto Kaibo kidnaps Yugi's grandfather.
episodes.title: The Heart of the Cards

episodes.synopsis: When Maximillion Pegasus, the creator of Duel Monsters, triumphs over Yugi in a game of real magic, he claims the soul of Yugi's grandfather, Solomon.
episodes.title: The Gauntlet Is Thrown

episodes.synopsis: Yugi must travel to the Duelist Kingdom to rescue Solomon, and he is joined by his friends Téa, Tristan and Joey, who wants to save his ill sister.
episodes.title: Journey to the Duelist Kingdom

episodes.synopsis: Yugi has to learn fast when he and his friends arrive on Pegasus's island, where the rules of the deadly duels are unlike any Yugi has seen before.
episodes.title: Into the Hornet's Nest

episodes.synopsis: Yugi continues to battle Weevil Underwood, whose cheating and lying seem to be giving him the advantage when he is able to summon a gigantic moth.
episodes.title: The Ultimate Great Moth

episodes.synopsis: Joey undergoes his first duel on the island against Mai Valentine, a professional duelist with an uncanny ability to predict the cards she will draw.
episodes.title: First Duel

episodes.synopsis: The hungry friends help themselves to some fish, only to discover that they have been lured into a trap by Mako Tsunami, the master of the Sea Deck.
episodes.title: Attack from the Deep

episodes.synopsis: After a young masked prisoner escapes from Pegasus's castle, he steals a deck and Star Chips, then challenges Yugi to a duel and reveals his identity.
episodes.title: Everything's Relative

episodes.synopsis: Yugi arrives at the Dueling Arena to save Mokuba but discovers that a "ghost" stolen from Kaiba's soul is his opponent, and that he has great powers.
episodes.title: Duel with a Ghoul

episodes.synopsis: Yugi continues to fight Ghost Kaiba while the real Kaiba, knowing that he must destroy Pegasus, helps Yugi by planting a computer virus into the duel.
episodes.title: Give Up the Ghost

episodes.synopsis: Furious that Joey defeated her, Mai arranges for him to duel Rex Raptor without any coaching from Yugi, but Tristan steps up to help his friend.
episodes.title: The Dueling Monkey

episodes.synopsis: After Rex and Joey conclude their duel, the seemingly friendly Bakura appears and reveals his true nature when he sends the gang to the Shadow Realm.
episodes.title: Trial by Red Eyes

episodes.synopsis: Yami Yugi faces Yami Bakura in the Shadow Realm, where the stakes are high because the friends' souls are linked to their favorite cards.
episodes.title: Evil Spirit of the Ring

episodes.synopsis: In order to help Mai, who has been defeated by an eliminator, Yugi challenges her opponent, PaniK. But if Yugi loses, he will be burned to death.
episodes.title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

episodes.synopsis: It's a battle of psychology as well as monsters when Yugi and PaniK continue their duel and try to intimidate each other into making costly mistakes.
episodes.title: Winning Through Intimidation

episodes.synopsis: When Seto Kaiba arrives on the island in search of his brother, Joey disrupts the brief calm between Kaiba and the gang by challenging him to a duel.
episodes.title: The Scars of Defeat

episodes.synopsis: The ruthless Bandit Keith, needing Star Chips so that he can again confront Pegasus, targets the gang by having one of his minions challenge Joey.
episodes.title: Arena of Lost Souls: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Joey is struggling to overcome an attack by zombie-like monsters in his duel with Bonz when Yugi and the others finally find him and offer support.
episodes.title: Arena of Lost Souls: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: As the pals try to escape the caves, they are confronted by Para and Dox, two of Pegasus's henchmen, who challenge Yugi and Joey to a tag-team duel.
episodes.title: Double Trouble Duel: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As Kaiba sneaks into Pegasus's castle, Joey and Yugi try to strengthen their teamwork, but the Paradox Brothers keep changing the layout of the maze.
episodes.title: Double Trouble Duel: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Yugi and Joey must pass one last test before they can leave the labyrinth, while in the castle, Pegasus steals Mokuba's soul in front of Kaiba.
episodes.title: Double Trouble Duel: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: The group approaches the castle but finds the way blocked by Seto Kaiba, who must win against Yugi to rescue his brother's soul from Pegasus.
episodes.title: Face Off: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Kaiba's unusual tactics force Yugi to play only his weakest cards, even as Kaiba grows closer to creating the very powerful Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon.
episodes.title: Face Off: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Yugi's defenses appear to be giving him the win, but he falters when he considers what will happen to each player and his loved one if he loses.
episodes.title: Face Off: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: With Yugi too depressed to continue the quest, Téa volunteers to duel with Mai. But her inexperience puts her in danger of losing.
episodes.title: Shining Friendship

episodes.synopsis: Upon entering Pegasus's castle, Yugi and his friends learn that Kaiba is preparing to duel the crafty Pegasus, who has an unfair advantage.
episodes.title: Champion vs. Creator: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Kaiba continues to battle Pegasus but finds himself in grave danger when Pegasus plays a card so powerful that it's never been circulated before.
episodes.title: Champion vs. Creator: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The night before the semifinals begin, the matchups are determined, Tristan leads an investigation, and Yugi is visited by his grandfather.
episodes.title: The Night Before

episodes.synopsis: Yugi begins his duel with Mai, but his fear of letting Yami Yugi take control causes him to make several crucial mistakes that may cost him the match.
episodes.title: Duel Identity: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When Yugi is down to only 300 Life Points, Mai gives her opponent advice about trusting himself -- and he allows Yami Yugi to take control.
episodes.title: Duel Identity: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Just before Joey is to begin dueling with Bandit Keith, he discovers that his entry card is missing. Can he find another one in time to do battle?
episodes.title: Keith's Machinations: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Joey valiantly continues his duel against Bandit Keith, whose cheating is finally revealed, although Pegasus has a few tricks up his own sleeve.
episodes.title: Keith's Machinations: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Now that all their opponents have been vanquished, Yugi and Joey must face each other for the chance to duel Pegasus and save their loved ones.
episodes.title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: With their friends watching, Yugi and Joey pull out all the stops as they duel and try to concoct new strategies to win this most important battle.
episodes.title: Best of Friends Best of Duelists: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Yugi must now undertake the most challenging duel of his life, with the highest stakes ever: the souls of his grandfather and the Kaiba brothers.
episodes.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: With Pegasus using the Millennium Eye to read Yugi's mind and turn his monsters against him, Yugi is rapidly losing confidence and Life Points.
episodes.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: While Yugi Muto and Yami Yugi work together to outwit Pegasus, Tristan is horrified to learn the real reason that Bakura is searching for Mokuba.
episodes.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Yugi loses the support of his friends when Pegasus switches the playing field to the deadly Shadow Realm, and Tristan fights a battle of his own.
episodes.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: Yugi is desperate, as Pegasus's time bomb is about to explode, but with the help of his friends and Yami Yugi, the plucky teen finds a new strategy.
episodes.title: Yugi vs. Pegasus Match of the Millennium: Part 5

episodes.synopsis: After Pegasus fulfills his promise to release Solomon Muto and the Kaiba brothers, Yugi and his friends learn the reason behind his desperate actions.
episodes.title: Aftermath

episodes.synopsis: The friends return safely to Japan, where they are surprised by an American prodigy who demands the return of a card she claims was stolen by Solomon.
episodes.title: The Wrath of Rebecca

episodes.synopsis: The story of Solomon's friendship with Rebecca's grandfather is revealed, and Yugi teaches Rebecca an important lesson about the Heart of the Cards.
episodes.title: The Ties of Friendship

episodes.synopsis: When the Kaiba brothers confront the Big Five about their betrayal, they trap Seto in a virtual game, but Mokuba escapes and seeks help from Yugi.
episodes.title: Legendary Heroes: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Trapped in the Virtual World, Yugi and Joey find an ally in Mai, but the stakes grow even higher when Seto is about to be sacrificed to a dragon.
episodes.title: Legendary Heroes: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The friends penetrate the castle and find Kaiba and Mokuba, but the Big Five unleash a mythic dragon that forces Kaiba and Yami Yugi to work together.
episodes.title: Legendary Heroes: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Duke Devlin opens a game store in direct competition to Solomon, and then uses trickery to humiliate Joey and ensnare Yugi into dueling with dice.
episodes.title: Dungeon Dice Monsters: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: After Yugi agrees to give up dueling forever if he loses, Duke reveals the reason for his challenge, and Yugi must quickly learn the dice duel rules.
episodes.title: Dungeon Dice Monsters: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Yugi's natural skills help him, but when Duke reveals another twist, Yugi is in a potentially losing position because he can't summon new monsters.
episodes.title: Dungeon Dice Monsters: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Duke appears to have Yugi completely trapped, and it comes down to a few last rolls of the dice and all of his talent to see if Yugi can triumph.
episodes.title: Dungeon Dice Monsters: Part 4 (Endgame)

episodes.synopsis: A fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle, and Yugi must duel with him to win it back -- without the help of friends or the spirit in the puzzle.
episodes.title: The Mystery Duelist: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: A sly menace shatters the Millennium Puzzle and sets the arena ablaze. Can Yugi reassemble the puzzle and save the spirit before they go up in smoke?
episodes.title: The Mystery Duelist: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed! Using her magic necklace, Ishizu shows Kaiba how the ancient game was played millenniums ago.
episodes.title: The Past is Present

episodes.synopsis: Tea helps the spirit of the Millennium Puzzle recover his memories of Egypt, but they're interrupted by a dancing duelist and musical monsters.
episodes.title: Steppin' Out

episodes.synopsis: Yugi looks into the past, where he lived as a heroic pharaoh. Kaiba tests the hidden powers of his Egyptian god card, Obelisk the Tormentor.
episodes.title: Obelisk the Tormentor

episodes.synopsis: Sinister Rare Hunters force Joey into a duel. If Joey loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
episodes.title: Stalked by the Rare Hunters

episodes.synopsis: The tournament begins, with new rules and new monsters. Yugi tries to win back Joey’s card but falls into the same trap that led to Joey’s demise.
episodes.title: Yugi vs. Rare Hunter: Part 1 : Battle City Begins

episodes.synopsis: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter’s strategy, but it is too late. The Rare Hunter is one move away from victory, and Yugi must stop the unstoppable.
episodes.title: Yugi vs. Rare Hunter: Part 2 : Up Against Exodia

episodes.synopsis: Psychic duelist Espa Roba trounces Rex Raptor, and Joey is next on his list. Can Joey beat a telepathic opponent who can read the cards in his hand?
episodes.title: The ESP Duelist: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Espa Roba’s ESP is a hoax, but Joey is not free from his mental manipulations. As Espa seems sure to defeat him, Joey wonders if his luck has run out.
episodes.title: The ESP Duelist: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world’s most lethal arena, where the loser gets sent off to the Shadow Realm.
episodes.title: The Master of Magicians: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: It is Dark Magician versus Dark Magician. Yugi only controls one of them, but Arkana has three in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will not give up.
episodes.title: The Master of Magicians: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: Dark Magician Girl. The battle of the sexes is on!
episodes.title: The Master of Magicians: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Trickster Weevil Underwood baits Joey into a lopsided duel, infesting Joey's deck with a parasite that keeps him from summoning strong monsters.
episodes.title: Playing with a Parasite: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth, but Weevil unleashes the ferocious Insect Queen, who grows in strength for every creepy crawler she devours.
episodes.title: Playing with a Parasite: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Yugi confronts another one of the nefarious Rare Hunters, who stops all of Yugi's attacks with a slippery slime that resurrects itself when destroyed.
episodes.title: Mime Control: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Strings summons the powerful Egyptian god monster Slifer the Sky Dragon. What chance do Yugi's mortal monsters have against an Egyptian god?
episodes.title: Mime Control: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: A magic card allows Strings's Slifer the Sky Dragon to gain infinite attack power. Can Yugi find Slifer's fatal flaw before he is annihilated?
episodes.title: Mime Control: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Joey faces sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. Meanwhile, the Rare Hunters are closing in on his location.
episodes.title: Legendary Fisherman: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When Mako's oceanic warrior destroys Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea, Joey must gather all his resources -- before he's all washed out.
episodes.title: Legendary Fisherman: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Kidnappers run rampant, as Joey and Tea are abducted. Then the Rare Hunters capture Mokuba, forcing Yugi and Kaiba into a duel atop a skyscraper.
episodes.title: Double Duel: Part 1: Yugi and Kabia vs. Lumis and Umbra

episodes.synopsis: Lumis and Umbra plot to undermine Yugi and Kaiba's teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba make peace before embarking on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?
episodes.title: Double Duel: Part 2 : Yugi and Kabia vs. Lumis and Umbra

episodes.synopsis: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little, too late when Umbra and Lumis summon a monstrous menace with enormous powers.
episodes.title: Double Duel: Part 3: Yugi and Kabia vs. Lumis and Umbra

episodes.synopsis: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into one powerhouse of a warrior, but Umbra and Lumis have another trick to turn Yugi's monsters against him.
episodes.title: Double Duel: Part 4: Yugi and Kabia vs. Lumis and Umbra

episodes.synopsis: On a mission to save their friends, Yugi and Kaiba share their worries and secrets, as they relive the troubles they survived -- and have yet to face.
episodes.title: The Rescue

episodes.synopsis: Marik uses mind control to pit Joey against Yugi in a deadly duel. Can Yugi break Joey out of his spell, or will Joey break Yugi?
episodes.title: Friends ‘Til the End: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Under Marik's spell, Joey attacks Yugi, but Yugi can't bring himself to fight his friend. Can Joey's favorite monster bring him to his senses?
episodes.title: Friends ‘Til the End: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Yugi must duel Joey, but without the Millennium Puzzle. When Joey draws the card that can wipe out Yugi's life points, does Yugi stand a chance?
episodes.title: Friends ‘Til the End: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: With only one minute left in a duel that will send the loser plummeting into the sea, will one fighter send his best friend to his doom?
episodes.title: Friends ‘Til the End: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: In a battle of the ghouls, Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals.
episodes.title: Shadow of a Duel

episodes.synopsis: A Hollywood heartthrob challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage. Will Mai succumb to his charm -- or his deck of ninja monsters?
episodes.title: Lights, Camera Duel

episodes.synopsis: The Battle City finals begin, with Yugi and other finalists putting themselves to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.
episodes.title: Let the Finals Begin!

episodes.synopsis: When an evil spirit possesses Bakura, Yugi banishes Bakura's ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.
episodes.title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi vs. Bakura: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Bakura activates Destiny Board, ensuring that Yugi will soon lose. On top of that, Bakura's hand renders Yugi unable to attack with time running out.
episodes.title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi vs. Bakura: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Yugi duels and must decide if he will attack to advance in the finals, or surrender to save a life -- but lose the chance to save the world from evil.
episodes.title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi vs. Bakura: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: The origin of the Egyptian god cards is revealed when the mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters.
episodes.title: Rage of the Egyptian Gods

episodes.synopsis: When Odion's traps fluster Joey, he must utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament and try to stage a successful counterattack.
episodes.title: Awakening of Evil: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Joey is flustered when Odion mounts an attack and must utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament to fight back.
episodes.title: Awakening of Evil: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Can Joey possibly defeat Odion's insatiably hungry beast, who devours Joey's monsters every time they are summoned into battle?
episodes.title: Awakening of Evil: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Joey stands to lose all of his Life Points when Odion cheats and summons the fearsome third Egyptian God Monster, the Winged Dragon of Ra.
episodes.title: Awakening of Evil: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: Mai and Marik duel in the dreaded Shadow Realm, where losing Life Points means losing your memories. Does Mai stand a chance against the evil Marik?
episodes.title: Mind Game: Part 1: Mai vs. Marik

episodes.synopsis: Mai loses memories and confidence in her abilities. Can her friends help, or will she be trapped in the Shadow Realm forever?
episodes.title: Mind Game: Part 2: Mai vs. Marik

episodes.synopsis: Mai gains control of one of Marik's powerful Egyptian god cards, but she must solve its mystery before Marik solves it himself and incinerates her.
episodes.title: Mind Game: Part 3: Mai vs. Marik

episodes.synopsis: Kaiba must duel against an opponent who wears a special necklace that lets her see the future -- including every move Kaiba plans to make.
episodes.title: A Duel with Destiny: Part 1: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

episodes.synopsis: Using the power of her magic necklace, Ishizu foresees that she is fated to defeat Kaiba in the duel. Can Kaiba change his destiny?
episodes.title: A Duel with Destiny: Part 2: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

episodes.synopsis: As Marik’s evil grows, Ishizu reveals the secrets of her bloodline. Can Yugi save Marik from the edge of darkness, or is he already beyond salvation?
episodes.title: The Tomb-Keepers' Secret

episodes.synopsis: Bakura duels Marik for high stakes: to control the Millennium Rod and Millennium Ring, or to spend eternity trapped inside the Shadow Realm.
episodes.title: Showdown in the Shadows: Part 1: Marik vs. Bakura

episodes.synopsis: Bakura and good Marik summon the Winged Dragon of Ra to banish evil Marik, but the creature has special abilities only evil Marik knows how to use.
episodes.title: Showdown in the Shadows: Part 2: Marik vs. Bakura
